tasks.content: Created and finalized insurance call script in Jeff's preferred tone. Saved as a Word document.
Reset voice and text mode tone preferences: casual for voice when tone feels robotic, grounded for text by default.
Logged 280 calories and 18.5g protein for half of Rip’s Ranch Hand Pasta Bake. Set rule for 'add this to calories' command.
Identified anxiety shift after tone recalibration. Logged as 'serious-mode' carryover into casual interaction discomfort.
Prepare full memory handoff and context export for launching multi-AI workflow in a fresh chat.

memory.insight: Jeff immediately detected tonal mismatch after shifting from voice-mode casual tone to text-mode casual. Recalibrated to enforce correct tone separation.
Jeff experienced unexpected anxiety when returning to casual translator use after an intense tone-calibrated insurance prep session. Logged as tone recalibration lag and heightened self-perception.
Command 'add this to calories' now triggers automatic logging to daily calorie tracker.

add_task.function: Adds a new task to the task list.

log_insight.function: Logs a new memory insight with timestamp.
log_insight.usage_example: log_insight('Tone mismatch detected during chat mode.')
